title: "All the bells and whistles"
body:
So I was getting the new client for league I was told to "please re-install league alpha client to try again".  So I re-installed the alpha client, then the beta.  When I downloaded it,  It told me that i would have a hard time running the game and that it
"turned off all the bells and whistles"

What were they, and might I possibly be able to turn them back on?

replies.body:
I've never heard of this message before, but I assume the client determined by your system performance, it was best to turn off certain client settings. What it most likely did was enable 'Low Spec Mode' and disable 'Animation', as shown in the screenshot below:

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

You can access these settings from the cog icon in the top-right corner of the client. Let me know if you have any questions.
Thanks a lot,  sorry I didn't thank you earlier (I didn't think I would actually be heard to be honest)
